Uses of Interface
opennlp.tools.doccat.FeatureGenerator

  • Packages that use FeatureGenerator 
    Package Description
    opennlp.tools.doccat
    Package for classifying a document into a category.

    • Uses of FeatureGenerator in opennlp.tools.doccat

      class  BagOfWordsFeatureGenerator
      Generates a feature for each word in a document.
